mapper.select: select d.`open_id` as openId, d.`name`, d.`nickname`, d.`sex`, d.`photo`, d.`tel`, d.`email`, d.`pid`, d.`real_auth` as realAuth, d.`summary`, d.`status`, cast(w.`balance` as char) as balance, d.`create_time` as createTime from tb_driver d join tb_wallet w on d.`id` = w.`driver_id` where d.`id` = #{driverId};
